duties_responsibilities.duty: Design automation frameworks and automated functional integration tests with and without multifactor authentication (MFA) in Agile environment.
Provide overall automation design and strategy for automated solutions in Fedwire to across all Payments products lines / environments.
Define automation strategy and design tools for functional and performance testing of critical systems.
Guide the design of automated tests for end-to-end quality working closely with multiple engineers and teams.
Craft automation to integrate with build pipelines and other automated unit, integration, and system tests.
Design test automation coverage for convoluted changes requiring testing efforts across multiple products and squads.
Participate in IT strategy development and proactive mentorship of squad members on automation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
